channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 14 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 14 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79ASL

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79ASN

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79ASS

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S14 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79DCL

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79DCN

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79DCS

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S14 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79GIE

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79INT

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mcl
item.description: LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79MCL

item.title: Field - mcn
item.description: NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79MCN

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79MCS

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MVS

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S14 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PTN

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - qsl
item.description: LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79QSL

item.title: Field - qsn
item.description: NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79QSN

item.title: Field - qss
item.description: OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79QSS

item.title: Field - r79ctext
item.description: Command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTEXT

item.title: Field - r79ctxtl
item.description: Length of command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTXTL

item.title: Field - r79dtext
item.description: Default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTEXT

item.title: Field - r79dtxtl
item.description: Length default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTXTL

item.title: Field - r79ecbt
item.description: Control unit busy delay time Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECBT

item.title: Field - r79ecbtm
item.description: Accumulated control unit busy delay time for DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: R79ECBTM

item.title: Field - r79ecmr
item.description: Initial CoMmand Response time Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECMR

item.title: Field - r79ecmrm
item.description: Accumulated initial CoMmand Response time for DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: R79ECMRM

item.title: Field - r79ecpat
item.description: Path attribute: 0 = No attributes specified, 1 = Preferred path, 2 = Non-preferred path Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECPAT

item.title: Field - r79ecpdl
item.description: LENGTH OF CONFIGURATION DATA SECTION Map: R79ECS Based on: R79ECPDL

item.title: Field - r79ecpdn
item.description: NUMBER OF CONFIGURATION DATA SECTIONS Map: R79ECS Based on: R79ECPDN

item.title: Field - r79ecpds
item.description: OFFSET TO CONFIGURATION DATA SECTION Map: R79ECS Based on: R79ECPDS

item.title: Field - r79ecpi
item.description: =1 IF CHANNEL PATH INST. Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79ecpst.

item.title: Field - r79ecpid
item.description: CHANNEL PATH IDENTIFIER Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECPID

item.title: Field - r79ecpm
item.description: =1 Channel path is DCM managed Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79ecpst.

item.title: Field - r79ecpmr
item.description: =1 CHPID manipulated, requiring data reset Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79ecpst.

item.title: Field - r79ecpo
item.description: =1 IF CHANNEL PATH ONLINE Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79ecpst.

item.title: Field - r79ecpst
item.description: CHANNEL PATH STATUS Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECPST Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79ecpi 0 =1 IF CHANNEL PATH INST. r79ecpo 1 =1 IF CHANNEL PATH ONLINE r79ecpv 2 =1 IF CHANNEL PATH VARIED r79evpof 3 =1 IF PATH OFFLINE TO ALL DEVICES TO THE LCU r79evp 4 =1 IF PATH CONNECTIVITY TO DEVICES OF THE LCU HAS MANIPULATED VIA VARY PATH r79ecpm 6 =1 Channel path is DCM managed r79ecpmr 7 =1 CHPID manipulated, requiring data reset

item.title: Field - r79ecptd
item.description: 1 = First-transfer-ready- disabled supported Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpxf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79ecpxf.

item.title: Field - r79ecpv
item.description: =1 IF CHANNEL PATH VARIED Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79ecpst.

item.title: Field - r79ecpx2
item.description: 1 = extended I/O- measurement-block format-2 data available Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpxf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79ecpxf.

item.title: Field - r79ecpxf
item.description: Channel Path extended flags Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECPXF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79ecpxm 0 1 = extended I/O- measurement-block format-1 data available r79ecpx2 1 1 = extended I/O- measurement-block format-2 data available r79ecptd 2 1 = First-transfer-ready- disabled supported

item.title: Field - r79ecpxm
item.description: 1 = extended I/O- measurement-block format-1 data available Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpxf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79ecpxf.

item.title: Field - r79ecsst
item.description: Channel subsystem wait time in units of 128 microseconds Map: R79EDS Based on: R79ECSST

item.title: Field - r79ectmw
item.description: Transport mode write count valid if R79ECPTD=1 Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECTMW

item.title: Field - r79ectrd
item.description: First-transfer-ready- disabled write count valid if R79ECPTD=1 Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECTRD

item.title: Field - r79ecu1
item.description: 1ST CONTROL UNIT ID. Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECU1

item.title: Field - r79ecu2
item.description: 2ND CONTROL UNIT ID. Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECU2

item.title: Field - r79ecu3
item.description: 3RD CONTROL UNIT ID. Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECU3

item.title: Field - r79ecu4
item.description: 4TH CONTROL UNIT ID. Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECU4

item.title: Field - r79ecub
item.description: COUNT OF CU BUSY Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECUB

item.title: Field - r79ecubm
item.description: Accumulated control unit busy count for DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: R79ECUBM

item.title: Field - r79ecun
item.description: NUMBER OF CONTROL UNITS ATTACHED Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ECUN

item.title: Field - r79edpbc
item.description: Number of initial selection attempts that were unsuccessful because ESCON Director port busy Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79EDPBC

item.title: Field - r79edpbm
item.description: Accumulated director port busy count for DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EDPBM

item.title: Field - r79edst
item.description: DATA STATUS Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EDST Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79enhma 1 =1 IF NO HARDWARE MEASUREMENTS AVAILABLE r79eldcm 4 =1 LCU contains DCM managed channels r79elpat 5 X'04’ Path attributes are valid

item.title: Field - r79egcmd
item.description: =1 Configuration contains DCM managed channels Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79egcmf
item.description: =1 DATA IS INVALID DUE TO FAILURE OF THE CHANNEL MESUREMENT FACILITY Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79egcmh
item.description: =1 DCM is supported by hardware Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79egcmr
item.description: =1 initial-command-response- time supported Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79egdif
item.description: =1 DIAGNOSE INTERFACE FAILURE Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79egdir
item.description: =1 ESCON Director in configuration Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79egflg
item.description: GLOBAL IOQ STATUS Map: R79EGD Based on: R79EGFLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79egcmf 0 =1 DATA IS INVALID DUE TO FAILURE OF THE CHANNEL MESUREMENT FACILITY r79egdif 1 =1 DIAGNOSE INTERFACE FAILURE r79egdir 2 =1 ESCON Director in configuration r79egssq 3 =1 CHSC store secondary queue data not supported r79egcmh 4 =1 DCM is supported by hardware r79egcmd 5 =1 Configuration contains DCM managed channels r79egcmr 6 =1 initial-command-response- time supported r79egtrd 7 First-transfer-ready- disabled write data available

item.title: Field - r79egsmp
item.description: Number of samples for store secondary queue measurement data Map: R79EGD Based on: R79EGSMP

item.title: Field - r79egssq
item.description: =1 CHSC store secondary queue data not supported Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79egtrd
item.description: First-transfer-ready- disabled write data available Map: R79EGD Based on: r79egflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79egflg.

item.title: Field - r79eid1
item.description: LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT IDENTIFIER Map: R79ECS Based on: R79EID1

item.title: Field - r79eid2
item.description: LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT IDENTIFIER Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EID2

item.title: Field - r79eldcm
item.description: =1 LCU contains DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: r79edst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79edst.

item.title: Field - r79elpat
item.description: X'04’ Path attributes are valid Map: R79EDS Based on: r79edst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79edst.

item.title: Field - r79emcdf
item.description: Defined number of DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EMCDF

item.title: Field - r79emcmn
item.description: Minimum number of DCM managed channels used Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EMCMN

item.title: Field - r79emcmx
item.description: Maximum number of DCM managed channels used Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EMCMX

item.title: Field - r79enhma
item.description: =1 IF NO HARDWARE MEASUREMENTS AVAILABLE Map: R79EDS Based on: r79edst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79edst.

item.title: Field - r79entr
item.description: NUMBER OF DESCRIPTOR TRIPLETS Map: R79ECS Based on: R79ENTR

item.title: Field - r79ept
item.description: COUNT OF OPERATION ACCEPTED ON THIS CHANNEL PATH Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79EPT

item.title: Field - r79eptm
item.description: Accumulated path taken count for DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EPTM

item.title: Field - r79eqct
item.description: Count of entries placed on the CU-HDR queue Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EQCT

item.title: Field - r79eqsm
item.description: ACCUMULATION OF CU-HDR Q LENGTH Map: R79EDS Based on: R79EQSM

item.title: Field - r79esbs
item.description: Switch busy count summation Map: R79ECPD Based on: R79ESBS

item.title: Field - r79esbsm
item.description: Accumulated switch busy count summation for DCM managed channels Map: R79EDS Based on: R79ESBSM

item.title: Field - r79etmwm
item.description: Accumulated transport mode write count for DCM managed channels valid if R79ECPTD=1 Map: R79EDS Based on: R79ETMWM

item.title: Field - r79etrdm
item.description: Accumulated first-transfer- ready-disabled write count for DCM managed channels valid if R79ECPTD=1 Map: R79EDS Based on: R79ETRDM

item.title: Field - r79evp
item.description: =1 IF PATH CONNECTIVITY TO DEVICES OF THE LCU HAS MANIPULATED VIA VARY PATH Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79ecpst.

item.title: Field - r79evpof
item.description: =1 IF PATH OFFLINE TO ALL DEVICES TO THE LCU Map: R79ECPD Based on: r79ecpst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79ecpst.

item.title: Field - r79goal
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79gtod
item.description: Data gatherer call TOD Map: R79CHL Based on: R79GTOD

item.title: Field - r79inv
item.description: inval. Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ist
item.description: Monitor I interval start time in 0HHMMSSF format Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IST

item.title: Field - r79iwmtk
item.description: Token returned from IWMRCOLL service Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IWMTK

item.title: Field - r79lf2
item.description: Flag byte Map: R79CHL Based on: R79LF2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79par 0 Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering r79sg 1 Report sorted by SG r79rsm 2 Invalid RSM data obtained r79goal 3 System is in GOAL mode r79trxi 4 Invalid transaction data r79srmc 5 SRM mode changed r79inv 6 inval. r79maxd 7 Incomplete device data due to too many devices

item.title: Field - r79maxd
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79NXT

item.title: Field - r79par
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79rid
item.description: Measurement name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79RID

item.title: Field - r79rsm
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ses
item.description: Session name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79SES

item.title: Field - r79sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79srmc
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large record Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TOT

item.title: Field - r79trxi
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TSR

item.title: Field - r79user
item.description: User field Map: R79CHL Based on: R79USER

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S14 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SNM

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S14 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S14 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S14 Based on: SMF79TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S14 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S14 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79XNM
